content:
/>
X.i.6.I.2.c
.
Handling Returned Mail
If the letter an MSC delivered or mailed to an IDES participant as described in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.I.2.a
is returned as undeliverable, the MSC must follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 2.C.6.d
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section I - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Processing Based on Service Department Outcomes
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section I
